dc:title: Frank's Landing
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Highlights a visit to Frank's Landing in Washington and learning of the plight of the Indians as they fought for their fishing rights. Many students from local universities created a living community that taught the ways of survival living amidst their demonstrations. Maiselle Bridges' narrates the story and living situation of the educational community and the other hardships the Indian reservations are experiencing.
